headline: FICO Lets Lenders Bypass Credit Bureaus — What That Means for Mortgage Applicants
summary: With FICO's new Mortgage Direct License Program, mortgage lenders can now buy FICO scores directly without going through the three major credit bureaus, Experian, Equifax and TransUnion. Up until now, lenders had to go through credit bureaus to buy ...
